Corporate Governance Policy The Board of Directors is committed to manage the organization efficiently to achieve its objectives

With strongly believes that the good corporate governance will elevate the companys operating performance to grow sustainably and is also the significant key to success in order to obtain the maximize valueadded for its shareholders

international standards and laws by perform in compliance with the Code of Good Corporate Governance of the Stock Exchange of Thailand and regulations of the Securities and Exchange Commission
